column1: Art Institute of Chicago////With tired feet and several hours in the museum under our belt
column2: we were satisfied with our time at the museum as we headed towards the exit before they closed at 5pm (8pm on Thursdays). Â But not without a visit to the gift shop
column3: where I read more about Grant Wood
column5: and saw a photo of his sister and his dentist (his models for the couple in American Gothic) beside the painting.
